data.title: How much easier is it to solve a 2x2 rubix cube as compared to a 3x3? If you can't solve a 2x2 cube, does that mean you're not very smart?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 4): Not much easeir, actually. To solve rubix cube, all you need to do is memorise some simple rules. It helps you have understood these rules, but that’s actually not needed.
